name: Food Guardians
description:
**MULTIPLAYER ONLY ON WINDOWS AS OF THE MOMENT**

Food! Glorious Food!

It is the cornerstone of civilization, the pinnacle of mankind, the foundation of the universe. You are one of many chosen to guard the forgotten food from the dangers that lurk in the shadows. It is not a task to be taken lightly nor is it an easy one.

So, prepare yourself! BE ON GUARD, FOOD GUARDIAN


Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Cursor to wield your mighty spoon
